name: Karmart
description:
(Play With 2 Controllers)

Experience the unique Karma of Multiplayer Platformer-Adventure stories enjoyed by you and your friend. solve puzzles with a help from your pets to had done the KARMA.

Solve the puzzles to escape the ruined KARMART because of the karma they made. A Multiplayer Platformer-Adventure that will take you to the unique puzzles and experience the creepy way of mart. explore the controller, environment, and finish the adventure to get things in a right place.

How to play Characters: D-Pad and Left Analog

How to play Pets: Right Analog

Actions: X/A, O/B Button

Gameplay: Avoid obstacles, solve puzzles.
